verses.verse: Now <S%H8297>Sarai<s%> <S%H87>Abram<s%>'s <S%H802>wife<s%> gave birth <S%H3205>to<s%> him <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H3205>sons<s%>: and she had a <S%H8198>handmaid<s%>, an <S%H4713>Egyptian<s%>, whose <S%H8034>name<s%> was <S%H1904>Hagar<s%>.

And <S%H8297>Sarai<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H87>Abram<s%>, See <S%H3068>now<s%>, the Lord has <S%H6113>prevented<s%> me from <S%H3205>bearing<s%>: I pray <S%H935>you<s%>, go in unto my <S%H8198>maid<s%>; it <S%H194>may<s%> be that I may obtain <S%H1129>sons<s%> by <S%H87>her<s%>. And Abram <S%H8085>listened<s%> to the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of <S%H8297>Sarai<s%>.

And <S%H8297>Sarai<s%> <S%H87>Abram<s%>'s <S%H802>wife<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H1904>Hagar<s%> her <S%H8198>maid<s%> the <S%H4713>Egyptian<s%>, <S%H7093>after<s%> <S%H87>Abram<s%> had <S%H3427>lived<s%> <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan<s%>, and <S%H5414>gave<s%> her to her <S%H376>husband<s%> <S%H87>Abram<s%> to be his <S%H802>wife<s%>.

And he went <S%H935>in<s%> unto <S%H1904>Hagar<s%>, and she <S%H2029>conceived<s%>: and when she <S%H7200>saw<s%> that she had <S%H2029>conceived<s%>, her <S%H1404>mistress<s%> was <S%H7043>despised<s%> in her <S%H5869>eyes<s%>.

And <S%H8297>Sarai<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H87>Abram<s%>, My <S%H2555>wrong<s%> is because of <S%H5414>you<s%>: I have given my <S%H8198>maid<s%> into your <S%H2436>bosom<s%>; and when she <S%H7200>saw<s%> that she had <S%H2029>conceived<s%>, I was <S%H7043>despised<s%> in her <S%H5869>eyes<s%>: the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> judge between me and <S%H8199>you<s%>.

But <S%H87>Abram<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H8297>Sarai<s%>, <S%H8198>Behold<s%>, your maid is in your <S%H3027>hand<s%>; <S%H6213>do<s%> to her as it pleases <S%H2896>you<s%>. And when <S%H8297>Sarai<s%> dealt harshly <S%H6031>with<s%> <S%H1272>her<s%>, she fled from her <S%H6440>face<s%>.

And the <S%H4397>angel<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> found <S%H4672>her<s%> by a <S%H5869>fountain<s%> of <S%H4325>water<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%>, by the <S%H5869>fountain<s%> in the <S%H1870>way<s%> to <S%H7793>Shur<s%>.

And he <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H1904>Hagar<s%>, <S%H8297>Sarai<s%>'s <S%H8198>maid<s%>, from <S%H335>where<s%> did you <S%H935>come<s%>? And where will you <S%H3212>go<s%>? And she <S%H559>said<s%>, I <S%H1272>flee<s%> from the <S%H6440>face<s%> of my <S%H1404>mistress<s%> <S%H8297>Sarai<s%>.
And the <S%H4397>angel<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H7725>her<s%>, Return to your <S%H1404>mistress<s%>, and <S%H6031>submit<s%> yourself under her <S%H3027>hands<s%>.

And the <S%H4397>angel<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H7235>her<s%>, I will multiply your <S%H2233>seed<s%> <S%H7235>exceedingly<s%>, that it shall not be <S%H5608>numbered<s%> for <S%H7230>multitude<s%>.

And the <S%H4397>angel<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H2009>her<s%>, Behold, you are with <S%H2030>child<s%>, and shall <S%H3205>bear<s%> a <S%H1121>son<s%>, and shall <S%H7121>call<s%> his <S%H8034>name<s%> <S%H3458>Ishmael<s%>; because the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> has <S%H8085>heard<s%> your <S%H6040>affliction<s%>.

And he will be a <S%H6501>wild<s%> <S%H120>man<s%>; his <S%H3027>hand<s%> will be against every <S%H3027>man<s%>, and every man's hand against <S%H7931>him<s%>; and he shall live in the <S%H6440>presence<s%> of all his <S%H251>brothers<s%>.

And she <S%H7121>called<s%> the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> that <S%H1696>spoke<s%> unto <S%H410>her<s%>, You God see <S%H7210>me<s%>: for she <S%H559>said<s%>, Have I also <S%H1988>here<s%> <S%H7200>seen<s%> <S%H310>him<s%> that sees <S%H7210>me<s%>?
Wherefore the <S%H875>well<s%> was <S%H7121>called<s%> <S%H883>Beer<s%>–lahai–roi; <S%H6946>behold<s%>, it is between Kadesh and <S%H1260>Bered<s%>.

And <S%H1904>Hagar<s%> gave birth <S%H3205>to<s%> <S%H87>Abram<s%> a <S%H1121>son<s%>: and <S%H87>Abram<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> his <S%H1121>son<s%>'s <S%H8034>name<s%>, which <S%H1904>Hagar<s%> gave birth <S%H3205>to<s%>, <S%H3458>Ishmael<s%>.
And <S%H87>Abram<s%> was <S%H8084>eighty<s%> and <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%>, when <S%H1904>Hagar<s%> gave birth <S%H3205>to<s%> <S%H3458>Ishmael<s%> to <S%H87>Abram<s%>.
